# Design System Implementation Command

Build or update frontend components and pages that strictly adhere to the project design system defined in design/design-system.json (and design/design.json when present)..

## Usage

```
/design-system-implementation
```

## What It Does

This command invokes the `design-system-implementation` skill. See the skill documentation for detailed process steps.

## Skill Reference

This command invokes: `@skills/design-system-implementation`

See `@skills/design-system-implementation/SKILL.md` for full documentation and `@skills/design-system-implementation/reference.md` for examples.
